Data: {"recipient_id": "31e3665d-bb86-4797-99bb-f3858967a26d", "custom": {"attachment": {"type": "template", "payload": {"template_type": "simple_form", "title": "Information for Ad Support Ticket", "description": "This form is used to collect user information in case the user needs additional help and a Jira Ticket needs to be filed with our Support Team.", "descriptionPosition": "top", "hidden_reply": true, "reply_text": "The user completes the submission of the form", "submit_button_title": "Send", "intent_name": "submit_form", "cancel_button": {"title": "Cancel", "type": "postback", "payload": "/cancel_for_input_data", "url": null, "is_enabled": false, "hidden_reply": true}, "is_mailerlite_form": false, "fields": [{"title": "Name", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-name.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_NAME"}, {"title": "Email", "type": "text", "icon_url": "https://seachat.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/images/icon-email.svg", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "_EMAIL"}, {"title": "Account ID", "type": "text", "icon_url": "", "is_required": true, "entity_name": "VAR_0001"}], "form_id": "ee27568f0b9f4826a7215c8197548501"}}}}

Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

Hello, I am on Organization billing screen. 
Any way to download this table or just download monthly bill by account?
We need it for internal reporting

Hi Misha! Unfortunately, there isn't a direct option to download the billing table or monthly bill by account from the Organization billing screen. However, you can review each payment you've made in 'transaction history' and track daily ad costs in the accompanying tab. If you need further assistance with reporting, feel free to reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com.

There 543 (about half of thousand) records in this table, you mean we shold process them manually one by one?
We need monthly bill, not daily

I understand that processing each record manually can be quite tedious, especially with a large number of entries. Unfortunately, the platform doesn't currently offer a direct way to download monthly bills by account. I recommend reaching out to adsupport@newsbreak.com for assistance with generating a monthly report or exploring any alternative solutions they might have.
Thanks for the help, we will check with email you send
You're welcome, Misha! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out. Thanks for contacting us and we want to hear from you!
